paper_abstract: We derive an alternative formulation for the interface reconstruction problem within the framework of the volume of fluid method. This leads to an interpolation problem which can be solved systematically by means of B-spline interpolation allowing a higher order description with respect to the grid spacing of the interface segments. This property is verified by numerical tests. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: High order interface reconstruction for the volume of fluid method
